ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Question
ygData.msgSnippet: the problem with Voodoo 3 cards is that it s hard to get updated drivers for them cause most vendors don t support them any more.  But my suggestion would be
ygData.messageBody:
the problem with Voodoo 3 cards is that it's hard to get updated drivers for them cause most vendors don't support them any more.  But my suggestion would be to try updating the drivers to the latest possible.
 
Also look on EQ's technical support site to see if any of their solutions match your problem.
 
Wulfric
 
 
 
----- Original Message -----
From: Deidre Choksy
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, August 16, 2002 1:39 PM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Question

Hi Rob,
  I have the Luclin expansion. My video card is a Voodoo 3 with 64mb of ram
in it. I'm not sure what's going on! This only started happening awhile
ago... and I haven't changed anything with my computer... I even uninstalled
a bunch of crap to try and make more room... *shrugs*
Sincerely,
Deidre

>What expansion do you have? Meaning Lucling, Trilogy,
>etc.
>
>The reason I ask is if it is Luclin, chances are your
>video memory is not enough for the rendering, not the
>RAM of the system.  If you have 500MB of Ram, you have
>plenty to run the game.
>
>Do you know what video card you have and how much
>Video Ram it can handle.  For instance, if I run
>Luclin on my laptop, the people show up naked....lol
>
>So your symptoms are different but I bet similar in
>cause.
>
>Let us know
>
>Rob
>
>
>--- electrum101 <electrum101@...> wrote:
> > Hey Everybody,
> > I'm new to the list! I have a general question that
> > hasen't been
> > answered for a few months now. I'm hoping one of you
> > might know what
> > the heck is going on! Ok, so this is what's
> > happening;
> > Whenever I zone my characters face will change!?!?!
> > I'm thinking it
> > has something to do with low memory but I have about
> > 500mb of ram.
> > And I'm not too keen on computers so if there is
> > another form of
> > memory that could be lacking please enlighten me!
> > This stupid problem
> > has coused me to quit playing for awhile. It makes
> > me sooo mad!!!!
> > Sincerely,
> > Deidre
> >
> >
>
